attributes.description:
1964 Corvette Stingray convertible C2 RED-ORIGINAL, 75000MILES.

A super rare very special car. This 1964 Corvette Stingray Convertible C2 (327) is in mint condition.
It has had full run through. Original clean sweet car.
This is a true American muscle classic car. The drive is so incredible, so much fun, real serious power and real drivers car.
It turns heads and brings on the best smile, especially for the driver.
Sexy red with matching red interior straight out of the 60â€™s.
Engine is a 327 V8 engine and it has had a full serviced, it gives and incredible sound.
4 speed manual, beautifully original it has the original upgraded disc brakes. Suspension and overhauled transmission.
Sexy side pipes, convertible with soft top. Car is light responsive and the fibreglass body means no rust from all the years of fun.
Riverside Red with the black strip on the stinger hood.
Original matching numbers car, this is something special.
Mileage: 75738.
attributes.title: 1964 Chevrolet Corvette Corvette Stingray C2
